Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2017 12:21AM 45andafighter wrote: I have a mixed cancer as well, and I get the same responses...Had a mastectomy on the left with a 3.4cm mass removed...mixed with a over 40 Ki-67, no radiation and possible chemo....clean margins and no node infiltration
